name: Free Library Tutoring Programs
description: Free tutoring and homework help through your local library, both in-person and online
fullDescription: Bay Area public libraries offer free tutoring and homework help programs for students of all ages, including online tutoring services available with a library card.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free one-on-one tutoring (in-person and online)
- Homework help in all subjects
- Reading and literacy support
- Math tutoring
- SAT/ACT test prep resources
- Online tutoring through Brainfuse or Tutor.com (varies by library)
howToGetIt:
1. Get a free library card from your local library
2. Check library website for tutoring programs
3. Many libraries offer Brainfuse HelpNow or similar online tutoring
4. In-person tutoring schedules vary by location
5. Some programs require appointments
keywords: tutoring, homework help, library, free, reading, math, academic support, after school, student
